amendment.description: To offset the disaster relief appropriations by rescinding amounts for foreign assistance programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 613 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 134.

Amendment SA 613 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 602. (consideration: CR S5653, S5655-5656, S5662-5663; text: CR S5655) To offset the disaster relief appropriations by rescinding amounts for foreign assistance programs.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 613 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 134.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 613 under the order of 9/15/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 20 - 78. Record Vote Number: 134.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 613 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 602.
